original.name: Ankit Aggarwal
original.title: Graduate, Stanford Center for Professional Development

enriched.name: Ankit Aggarwal
enriched.title: Graduate, Stanford Center for Professional Development
enriched.bio: Graduate, Stanford Center for Professional Development. Experienced civil engineer (8+ years); currently Assistant Construction Manager at Larsen & Toubro (since Jan 2024) working on the Mumbai–Ahmedabad high‑speed rail project. Prior experience includes Afcons Infrastructure Limited (Delhi–Meerut RRTS) and internships at Sobha Ltd. and Pratibha Industries. B.E. in Civil Engineering from VIT University (2013–2017) and EPBA in Business Analysis (Adani Institute of Digital Technology Management, 2023). Co‑author of a paper on steel fiber reinforced concrete using recycled aggregate (International Journal of Technology). Location: Mandi, Himachal Pradesh, India.

notes: Ankit Aggarwal is a civil engineer with over 8 years of experience, currently serving as Assistant Construction Manager at Larsen & Toubro on the Mumbai-Ahemdabad high speed rail project since January 2024. He holds a Bachelor's degree in Civil Engineering from VIT University (2013-2017) and an EPBA in Business Analysis from Adani Institute of Digital Technology Management (2023). He has prior experience at Afcons Infrastructure Limited and internships at Sobha Ltd. and Pratibha Industries Ltd. He co-founded the Indian Concrete Institute VIT Student Chapter and has published research on steel fiber reinforced concrete using recycled aggregate in the International Journal of Technology (2016). Awards include the Student Achiever Award from VIT University and prizes from IIT Madras. He is proficient in English, Hindi, Marwari, and has elementary Spanish skills. His skills include project planning, tunneling, construction management, strategic planning, and engineering software tools. His location is Mandi, Himachal Pradesh, India. Confirmed profiles include LinkedIn (https://www.linkedin.com/in/ankit-aggarwal) and Stanford profile (https://profiles.stanford.edu/ankit-aggarwal). Email is ankagg94@stanford.edu.
